Complete reference
This is a complete reference for the

object in Atlan, showing every possible property and relationship that can exist for these objects. For an introduction, you probably want to start with:

Properties
Â¶
These attributes are specific to instances of
Dataverse
(and all of its subtypes).
dataverseIsAuditEnabled
Â¶
Indicator if DataverseEntity has auditing enabled.
dataverseIsCustom
Â¶
Indicator if DataverseEntity is custom built.
dataverseIsCustomizable
Â¶
Indicator if DataverseEntity is customizable.
